name: eMedReport.com
tag_list: emedireport, emedi, e-medi, healthcare, pharmacy, online-prescriptions, healthcare-providers, pharmacies, diagnostic-centers, health-information, pathology-labs, online-appointments, personal-health-records, patient-health-records, online-diagnostic-resul
overview:
eMedReport.com supports the delivery of healthcare. It is an integrated web portal, which supports the healthcare providers to improve the patient care and overall efficiency in the delivery of healthcare. eMedReport is a convenient, fast and secure web portal designed by in-house medical and pharmaceutical experts, connecting all healthcare providers under one network. The major goal of eMedReport is to provide a best platform for patients, physicians, pharmacies and diagnostic centers for fast and secure communication for the exchange of health information. A one stop solution, for all the players in the delivery of health care.

eMedReport offers:

* A convenient, fast and secure web portal for patients, doctors, 
   hospitals, pharmacies, pathology labs and diagnostic centers to
   communicate with each other at minimal investment cost
* Patients can fix up online appointments, can access and 
   maintain their personal health records, view online
   prescriptions and diagnostic results
* Doctors can view their appointments online and can also access
   the patient health records. They can send the prescription and 
  diagnostic requests online to pharmacies and diagnostic centers
   and can also view test results online
* Doctors can create drug-drug interaction alerts, which would 
   help them in prescribing the right medication to the right 
   patient at the right time
* Doctors can also subscribe to receive SMS alerts when patient 
   results are available from pathology or diagnostic center
* Pharmacies can maintain an inventory of the drugs, there by
   maintaining a balance between demand and supply and would 
   get regular alerts of the list of drugs expired and about to
   expire in the store.
* All eMediReport users can have access to a variety of health
   topics and patient education tools on various public health
   topics such as HIV/AIDS, Cancer, Diabetes, Asthma etc
